languages.text: "В тот час, когда ты действительно возьмешь в свои пособники столь чудовищное орудие Архиврага, мое оружие обернется против тебя — и тогда, поверь, ничто не убережет тебя от праведного возмездия!"

"Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"
languages.original_text: "В тот час, когда ты действительно возьмешь в свои пособники столь чудовищное орудие Архиврага, мое оружие обернется против тебя — и тогда, поверь, ничто не убережет тебя от праведного возмездия!"

traits.locale_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Si vous devez un jour utiliser une arme abominable du Grand Ennemi, ce sera le jour où je retournerai mon arme contre vous. Et à ce moment-là, croyez-moi, rien ne pourra vous sauver du jugement de l'Empereur ! »
languages.original_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"

traits.locale_text: « Si vous devez un jour utiliser une arme abominable du Grand Ennemi, ce sera le jour où je retournerai mon arme contre vous. Et à ce moment-là, croyez-moi, rien ne pourra vous sauver du jugement de l'Empereur ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Sollte jemals die Stunde kommen, wenn Ihr in der Tat eine abscheuliche Waffe des Erzfeinds einsetzen müsst, so wird dies die Stunde sein, in der sich meine Waffe gegen Euch richtet — und dann, so schwöre ich, wird Euch nichts vor dem rechtschaffenen Urteil bewahren können!"
languages.original_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"

traits.locale_text: "Sollte jemals die Stunde kommen, wenn Ihr in der Tat eine abscheuliche Waffe des Erzfeinds einsetzen müsst, so wird dies die Stunde sein, in der sich meine Waffe gegen Euch richtet — und dann, so schwöre ich, wird Euch nichts vor dem rechtschaffenen Urteil bewahren können!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Si llega el momento en el que use una de las aborrecibles armas del Archienemigo, dirigiré mi arma contra usted... y créame, ¡nada podrá salvarle de mi justo juicio cuando llegue esa hora!».
languages.original_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"

traits.locale_text: «Si llega el momento en el que use una de las aborrecibles armas del Archienemigo, dirigiré mi arma contra usted... y créame, ¡nada podrá salvarle de mi justo juicio cuando llegue esa hora!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「あなたが実際に忌まわしい仇敵の武器を使うような時が来るとしたら、それが私の武器があなたに向けられる時だ ― そしてそうなれば、保証するが、正義の裁きからは絶対に逃れられないと思うことだ！」
languages.original_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたが実際に忌まわしい仇敵の武器を使うような時が来るとしたら、それが私の武器があなたに向けられる時だ ― そしてそうなれば、保証するが、正義の裁きからは絶対に逃れられないと思うことだ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “如果某一天，你真的使用了混沌大敌的武器，那我的武器就会对准你。到了那个时候，别忘了我的话——没有任何东西可以让你免受正义的审判！”
languages.original_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"

traits.locale_text: “如果某一天，你真的使用了混沌大敌的武器，那我的武器就会对准你。到了那个时候，别忘了我的话——没有任何东西可以让你免受正义的审判！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Şerbaşı'nın bu iğrenç silahına başvuracağın vakit, silahımı sana çevirdiğim vakit olacaktır. Sözüme güven, o vakit geldiğinde hiçbir şey seni gerçek yargıdan kurtaramayacak!"
languages.original_text: "Should the hour ever come when you indeed employ an abominable weapon of the Archenemy, it will be the hour when my weapon turns against you — and then, trust my word on it, nothing will save you from righteous judgement!"
